channel.title: Disabling annoying sounds?
channel.description: Okay found an old laptop and whenever I accidently press backwards where I'm not allowed to it emits a loud internal beep. Now as I haven't installed the sound driver yet I know it's not just some error sound coming out the speakers and it's from something inside. How do I disable it as I'm trying to work quietly right now?

item.title: Disabling annoying sounds?
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

HE HASN’T INSTALLED THE DRIVER YET NUMB NUTS.

Some BIOS’s allow you to turn it off, otherwise I believe (don’t quote me on it), there is software to do so in a google search.

Read full topic

item.title: Disabling annoying sounds?
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

goatee:

Okay found an old laptop and whenever I accidently press backwards where I’m not allowed to it emits a loud internal beep. Now as I haven’t installed the sound driver yet I know it’s not just some error sound coming out the speakers and it’s from something inside. How do I disable it as I’m trying to work quietly right now?

Maybe there’s a defect with the sound card? Check it out

Read full topic

item.title: Disabling annoying sounds?
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Open it and stab the speaker. Or BIOS myb.

Read full topic
